Summary: Seen Frieball object very low to the ground polsating and very bright !!!
divs: sighting detailsmy mother was setting on the front porch when see opened the door and screamed for me to come out side and when i ran out she pointed out over the pouch banister for me to look on what she was seeing and what i was seen was a very bright low reddish in color what look to me was a fireball ball and it looked to me like it was changing shape or form in side the light if any one else has seen this object please contact me *(email address deleted-cms\sg) the question that scratches my mind is what are they??? see them here every year at this time!!!
